A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney has killed star wars. I watched a 2 1/2 hour commercial for kids toys. That whole sub plot with Finn and Rose was pointless\, only there to step up the end scene with the slave boy with a broom... I'm so disappointed. The theme of the movie was story doesn't matter\, just buy star wars merchandise....  No set up for episode 9 so no reason to see it... after 30 years of fandom\, I'm done.
